org.aopalliance.intercept

接口 ConstructorInvocation

  • 所有超级接口:
    Invocation, Joinpoint

    public interface ConstructorInvocation
extends Invocation
    Description of an invocation to a constuctor, given to an interceptor upon constructor-call.

    A constructor invocation is a joinpoint and can be intercepted by a constructor interceptor.

    另请参阅:
    ConstructorInterceptor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Constructor<?> getConstructor()
      Get the constructor being called.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.aopalliance.intercept.Joinpoint

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConstructor

        Constructor<?> getConstructor()
        Get the constructor being called.

        This method is a friendly implementation of the Joinpoint.getStaticPart() method (same result).

        返回:
        the constructor being called
